survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from freelancers regarding their experience with various payment platforms, focusing on ease of use, reliability, and satisfaction.

questions.question_text: Which payment platform do you primarily use for receiving freelance payments?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the 'Other' option includes an open-text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which payment platform do you primarily use for receiving freelance payments?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the speed of transactions on your primary payment platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the speed of transactions on your primary payment platform?

questions.question_text: What are the most important features you consider when choosing a payment platform? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to select multiple options but limit to 3.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with a maximum selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: What are the most important features you consider when choosing a payment platform? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any issues with your primary payment platform in the last 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Follow up with an open-ended question if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional routing to Q5 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any issues with your primary payment platform in the last 6 months?

questions.question_text: Please describe the issue(s) you encountered with your primary payment platform.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q4 is answered with 'Yes'
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with conditional display logic.

script.question_text: Please describe the issue(s) you encountered with your primary payment platform.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q4 is answered with 'Yes'

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your primary payment platform to other freelancers?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your primary payment platform to other freelancers?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your primary payment platform?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed suggestions.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your primary payment platform?
